text: Yuxi Town () is a town and the county seat in the central south of Yizhang County, Hunan, China. The town was formed through the amalgamation of Chengnan Township () and Chengguan Town () in 2012, it has an area of with a population of 84,300 (as of 2012).the area and population of Yuxi Town in 2012, according to the result on adjustment of township-level administrative divisions of Yizhang County in 2012 - 湖南省民政厅 湘民行发〔2012〕5号, see xzqh.org (2016-02-04) (宜章县历史沿革 - History of Yizhang County) Yuxi Town is located under the Qitian Mountains, it is bordered by Pingshi Town of Lechang City to the south, Wuling Town () to the east, Liangtian Town () of Suxian District to the north, Meitian Town () to the west.玉溪镇 (简介) - Introduction Yuxi Town, see Yizhang.gov.cn (2015-07-24) Its seat is at Luojiashan Village (). ==References== Category:Yizhang County Category:County seats in Hunan
title: Yuxi, Yizhang
